mean_en: always behaving in the same way, or having the same opinions, standards, etc.; happening in the same way and continuing for a period of time; in agreement with something; not contradicting something; (of an argument or a set of ideas) having different parts that all agree with each other
sentence: Her dream of becoming a nurse remained consistent throughout her life.
sentence_trans: 在她的一生中，成为一名护士的愿望始终没有变。
word_etyma: con共同 + sist站立 + ent形容词后缀……的 → consistent 一致的，一贯的
